title: Sell Russell's Reserve Single Rickhouse
metaTitle: Sell Russell's Reserve Single Rickhouse | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Russell's Reserve Single Rickhouse and other limited editions. We buy Camp Nelson C, F, and other rickhouse releases. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy Russell's Reserve Single Rickhouse and limited releases directly.
introParagraph: Russell's Reserve Single Rickhouse Collection showcases the specific terroir of Wild Turkey's aging warehouses. Whether you have Camp Nelson C, F, or other single rickhouse bottlings, we are active buyers. We also purchase Russell's Reserve 13 Year and older vintage releases. Get a fair direct offer today.
whatWeBuy: Russell's Reserve Single Rickhouse Camp Nelson C
Russell's Reserve Single Rickhouse Camp Nelson F
Russell's Reserve Single Barrel Private Select (Select barrels)
whatWeDoNotBuy: Standard Russell's Reserve 10 Year (unless part of collection)
photoChecklist: Front label showing the Rickhouse designation
Neck tag or hang tag details
Laser code on glass (helps confirm batch)
Condition of the label and closure
conditionFactors: Hang tags should be present for full value on Single Rickhouse releases
pricingFactors: Specific Rickhouse release (e.g., Camp Nelson C vs others)
Market demand for high-proof Wild Turkey products

faqs.question: Do you buy Russell's Reserve 13 Year?
faqs.answer: Yes, Russell's Reserve 13 Year is one of the most requested bottles we purchase. All batches are welcome.

faqs.question: What is the Single Rickhouse Collection?
faqs.answer: It is a limited annual series highlighting whiskey from a specific rickhouse (warehouse) at Wild Turkey.

faqs.question: Do you buy store pick Single Barrels?
faqs.answer: Yes, we buy private barrel selections (store picks), especially those with unique flavor profiles or from well-known groups.

faqs.question: Do you buy the older 1998 or 2002 vintages?
faqs.answer: Yes, these vintage releases are highly collectible and very valuable.

faqs.question: How do I ship my bottles?
faqs.answer: We provide a prepaid shipping label and instructions. Use plenty of bubble wrap and a sturdy box.

faqs.question: What if I have a full case?
faqs.answer: We buy full cases and collections. Shipping large quantities is something we specialize in coordinating.
